articles.description: HOME ALONE celebrates its thirtieth anniversary this year just in time for us all to face Xmas home alone in Tier 4! The film made a global star of Macaulay Culkin but what happened to the other children who played the McCallister siblings? One gave up acting…

articles.title: Prince Harry has ‘devil-may-care attitude of Diana and Philip’s blunderability’ - Daily Express
articles.description: PRINCE HARRY has the 'devil-may-care' attitude of his mother Princess Diana, along with the so-called 'blunderability' of his grandfather Prince Philip, a royal commentator told Express.co.uk.

articles.title: Netflix's movie machine is coming to steal Christmas - Wired.co.uk
articles.description: Hallmark reined supreme over festive films. Now Netflix is going after its Christmas crown
articles.content: Twas two months before Christmas. A cynical, career-driven city girl meets a sweet small-town boy. Despite some bumps in the road, the two fall madly, deeply in love, all just in time for Christmas. … [+7000 chars]

articles.title: Tom Cruise slammed for using 'less safe PPE mask' following Covid on-set meltdown - Mirror Online
articles.description: It would seem Tom might be posing a risk to the health and safety of all cast and crew on the set of Mission Impossible 7 after being spotted wearing a protective mask that experts have warned doesn't work
articles.content:
Tom Cruise may need to fire himself from Mission Impossible 7 after seemingly being rumbled for wearing a mask on set that offers little to no protection from Covid-19.
